metadata.title: Belarus and Iran agree to boost bilateral defense ties

left: Belarus intends to strengthen ties with Iran across all sectors, including military cooperation, as stated by President Lukashenko.
Lukashenko emphasized that there are no closed topics between Belarus and Iran, aiming for practical steps in various fields.
Iranian official Pezeshkian mentioned that Iran will assist Belarus in neutralizing economic restrictions using their experience.
The two nations plan to begin work on a strategic partnership treaty to formalize their cooperation.
